title: No train service from Labrador Park towards HarbourFront due to signal fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于信号故障，拉布拉多公园站往海湾舫站方向的列车服务暂停
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api dari Labrador Park ke arah HarbourFront kerana kerosakan isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னல் கோளாறு காரணமாக லாப்ரடோர் பார்க் முதல் ஹார்பர்ஃபிரண்ட் வரை ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #PasirPanjang and #HarbourFront are now   running normally. Free bus services have ceased.
[CCL]   UPDATE: Train services have resumed. Trains and platforms are crowded. Free bus services are still available.

[CCL]   UPDATE: Train service is resuming between #PasirPanjang and #HarbourFront. 
        Trains and platforms are crowded.
[CCL] UPDATE: Free public   & shuttle buses are now available at affected stations between   #PasirPanjang towards #HarbourFront.
[CCL] UPDATE: Free public  & shuttle buses are now available at affected stations between   #LabradorPark towards #HarbourFront.
[CCL] UPDATE: No train  service from #LabradorPark towards #HarbourFront  both bounds due to signal fault.
